step1.title: Set up your personal billing profile.
step1.description: Verify your personal information and provide your document ID.

step2.title: Complete your first contribution.
step2.description: Even if it’s not rewarded, we value your work on your profile.

step3.title: Claim your first reward
step3.description: Go to your reward page and follow the 2 min process.

step4.title: Update your description
step4.description: To help other find out who you really are.

step5.title: Update your contact methods.
step5.description: Make sure that you’re reachable through multiple accounts.
